definition: Anshan prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China
saddle
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Anshan prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China
Ma'anshan prefecture-level city in Anhui
Ma'anshan prefecture-level city in Anhui

sentences.english: Nanguo pear is the special local product of Anshan, Liaoning.
sentences.chinese: 南果梨是遼寧鞍山特產。

sentences.english: Introduced the designs and implementation plans of Maanshan CATV broadband data network.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了馬鞍山有線寬帶數據網的設計與組網方案。

sentences.english: Since 1981, development works have been extended to Ma On Shan.
sentences.chinese: 自一九八一年起，發展工程已延展至馬鞍山。

sentences.english: Inland, Ma On Shan County Park is a hiker's dream.
sentences.chinese: 在陸上，馬鞍山縣立公園是徒步旅行者夢想的地方。

sentences.english: Maanshan has developed into an industrial city from a fishing village.
sentences.chinese: 馬鞍山已經從一個小漁村發展成爲了一個工業城市。

sentences.english: Passengers may change to Ma On Shan Rail trains at Tai Wai.
sentences.chinese: 乘客可以在大圍站換乘馬鞍山鐵路列車。

sentences.english: The former name of the school was Ma On Shan Lutheran Primary School.
sentences.chinese: 該校的前稱爲馬鞍山信義學校。

sentences.english: The Nanguo pear is the specialty of Anshan region and also the main pocketbook of the local farmers.
sentences.chinese: 南果梨是鞍山地區特產，是當地農民的主要經濟來源。

sentences.english: The author focuses on the status of drugging in Anshan, and puts forward some countermeasures and methods for the work of ban on drugging.
sentences.chinese: 依據鞍山地區毒品狀況，提出禁毒工作的對策和方法。

sentences.english: Upon full development, Ma On Shan will house more than 200000 people.
sentences.chinese: 馬鞍山在全面發展後，將可容納居民超過20萬人。

sentences.english: There are nine stations on Ma On Shan Rail.
sentences.chinese: 馬鞍山鐵路共設有九個車站。

sentences.english: Beautiful Saddle Hill, clear Caishi Water.
In Hong Kong, the locality of its occurrence is within Ma On Shan Country Park under protection.
sentences.chinese: 在香港其生長地點在馬鞍山郊野公園內，受到保護。

sentences.english: Public Security Economic Investigation Information Net of Anshan …
sentences.chinese: 鞍山公安經偵信息網的英文寫法？

sentences.english: Sandaoling iron deposit in Liaoyang, Liaoning Province is a lately explored lean iron deposit of Anshan type.
sentences.chinese: 遼陽三道嶺鐵礦是近年來勘探開發的鞍山式貧鐵礦牀。

sentences.english: Ashan is a quiet, peaceful city, known also as "the Pearl of the Northeast".
sentences.chinese: 鞍山被稱爲“東北明珠”，是一個寧靜而祥和的城市。
